sqlMap.select:
select * from ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM( SELECT f.*,B.ZBX,B.ZBY,B.mldzID AS BZDZID FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB B,SYFW_FWJBXXB F WHERE B.XT_ZXBZ='0' and F.XT_ZXBZ ='0' and B.mldzID = F.fwdz_mlpdm
F.fwdz_dzxz like '%' || #fwjbxxb.fwdz_dzxz# ||'%'
F.fwlbdm = #fwjbxxb.fwlbdm#
F.fz_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.fz_xm# ||'%'
F.sfczfw = #fwjbxxb.sfczfw#
b.zrqdm= #fwjbxxb.ss4jbmdm#
f.fwdz_dzxz || f.fz_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.condition#|| '%'
order by $sort$ $order$
) m where rownum <= #end# ) where r > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT B.mldzID AS BZDZID FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB B,SYFW_FWJBXXB F WHERE B.XT_ZXBZ='0' and F.XT_ZXBZ ='0' and B.mldzID = F.fwdz_mlpdm
F.fwdz_dzxz like '%' || #fwjbxxb.fwdz_dzxz# ||'%'
F.fwlbdm = #fwjbxxb.fwlbdm#
F.fz_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.fz_xm# ||'%'
F.sfczfw = #fwjbxxb.sfczfw#
b.zrqdm = #fwjbxxb.ss4jbmdm#
f.fwdz_dzxz || f.fz_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.condition#|| '%'
)

select * from ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM( SELECT * FROM $tableName$ WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ ='0'
T.fwdz_dzxz like '%' || #fwjbxxb.fwdz_dzxz# ||'%'
T.fwlbdm = #fwjbxxb.fwlbdm#
T.fz_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.fz_xm# ||'%'
T.tgr_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.tgr_xm# ||'%'
T.sfczfw = #fwjbxxb.sfczfw#
T.fwytdm = #fwjbxxb.fwytdm#
T.fwdz_dzxz || T.fz_xm || T.tgr_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.condition#|| '%'
T.fwdz_mlpdm = P.MLDZID
SDE.ST_WITHIN(P.SHAPE,SDE.ST_BUFFER(SDE.ST_POINT('POINT($fwjbxxb.drawZbz$)',$fwjbxxb.drawSrid$),$fwjbxxb.drawRadius$))=1
SDE.ST_ENVINTERSECTS(P.SHAPE,$fwjbxxb.drawZbz$)=1
SDE.ST_WITHIN(P.SHAPE,SDE.ST_POLYGON('polygon(($fwjbxxb.drawZbz$))',$fwjbxxb.drawSrid$))=1
order by $sort$ $order$
) m where rownum <= #end# ) where r > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(T.ID) FROM $tableName$ WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ ='0'
T.fwdz_dzxz like '%' || #fwjbxxb.fwdz_dzxz# ||'%'
T.fwlbdm = #fwjbxxb.fwlbdm#
T.fz_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.fz_xm# ||'%'
T.tgr_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.tgr_xm# ||'%'
T.sfczfw = #fwjbxxb.sfczfw#
T.fwytdm = #fwjbxxb.fwytdm#
T.fwdz_dzxz || T.fz_xm || T.tgr_xm like '%' || #fwjbxxb.condition#|| '%'
T.fwdz_mlpdm = P.MLDZID
SDE.ST_WITHIN(P.SHAPE,SDE.ST_BUFFER(SDE.ST_POINT('POINT($fwjbxxb.drawZbz$)',$fwjbxxb.drawSrid$),$fwjbxxb.drawRadius$))=1
SDE.ST_ENVINTERSECTS(P.SHAPE,$fwjbxxb.drawZbz$)=1
SDE.ST_WITHIN(P.SHAPE,SDE.ST_POLYGON('polygon(($fwjbxxb.drawZbz$))',$fwjbxxb.drawSrid$))=1
